name: Ramblas Investigador Privado
overview:
It is a detective adventure where we find all the clues to solve the case. The action takes place in Barcelona. (Take it now!) And you are Ramblas, the most famous detective in the city and the toughest hound we have ever been able to face, feared by all. Friends and enemies respect you but also hate you. We would not be surprised if someone tried to hinder your investigation. But what is the case in which you have been involved?

Remember. You were in the office that morning when the secretary told you that a Mariano Vega had called and handed you the envelope received half an hour earlier. After reading it you looked thoughtful looking at the emergency stamp attached to the letter. The adventure starts here.
developers: M. Angels Ribas i Josep Canal
